description: A multi-agent system that generates, edits, and schedules blog posts based on topics and deadlines.

secrets.description: Used by agents to access GPT models
Token to publish posts to a Blogger account

agents.name: topic_extractor
agents.description: Extracts blog post topics from user input or content backlog.

agents.name: content_writer
agents.description: Generates blog content based on extracted topics.

agents.name: editor
agents.description: Refines and edits the generated content for tone, grammar, and SEO.

agents.name: publisher
agents.description: Schedules or publishes the final blog post using the Blogger API.
